The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 22 August is 2,894 (335 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 18 August, there were 36 new confirmed cases (4.2 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 11 August, there were 19 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 89% (17 extra cases).
